## Unit 1: Outcome Types, Data Structures, and Validity

**Topics**: 

- Conceptual differences in continuous, dichotomous, and count outcomes

- Reliability (internal consistency) of measures 

- Nested data and methods to account for nesting/clustering in analyses 

- Data with missingness and methods to handle missingness 

**Readings**:

 * Complete prior to April 3 meeting: Dunn et al, 2014 
 * Complete prior to April 8 meeting: BMLR Ch. 8.1-8.5 (pp. 211-231) 
 * Complete prior to April 15 meeting: Little et al, 2014 

**Lecture**:

 * Lecture slides: [Course Overview](./slides/EDUC645_1_Intro.html) | [Outcome Types & Reliability](./slides/EDUC645_1_Outcome_Types_Reliability.html) | [Nested Data](./slides/EDUC645_1_Nested_Data.html) | [Missing Data](./slides/EDUC645_1_Missing_Data.html)
 * Datasets: [NHANES_data1112](./data/NHANES_data1112.RData) | [ah_happiness](./data/ah_happiness.RData) | [seda](./data/seda_oregon.csv) | [galo](./data/galo.csv)

**Lab Worksheets**

 * [Week 1 worksheet](./labs/s25_lab1.Rmd) | [Week 2 worksheet](./labs/s25_lab2.Rmd) | [Week 3 worksheet](./labs/s25_lab3.Rmd)

**Assignment**:

 * Due April 24
 * [Assignment details](./assignments/assignment01_Sp25.html)
 
**Unit Quiz**: Due April 14 (Canvas)

## Unit 2: Analyzing Dichotomous Outcomes

**Topics**: 

- Outcome measures for dichotomous data 

- Methods to analyze dichotomous outcomes 

- Fitting and interpreting logistic regression models with single-level data, nested (clustered) data, longitudinal data, and missing data

**Readings**: 

 * Complete prior to April 22 meeting: BMLR Ch. 2 (pp. 39-68) 
 * Complete prior to April 29 meeting: BMLR Ch. 6 (pp. 151-180) 
 * Complete prior to May 6 meeting: BMLR Ch. 8.6-8.11 (pp. 234-251); Recommended: BMLR Ch. 11 (pp. 373-398) 
 * Complete prior to May 13 meeting: BMLR Ch. 9.1-9.7 (pp. 263-306) 
 
**Lecture**:

 * Lecture slides: [Logistic Regression 1](./slides/EDUC645_2_Logistic1.html) | [Logistic Regression 2](./slides/EDUC645_2_Logistic2.html)
 * Datasets: [NHANES_data1112](./data/NHANES_data1112.RData) | [add_health_miss](./data/add_health_miss.RData) | [seda](./data/seda.RData) | [popular](./data/popular.RData) | [respire](./data/respire.RData) 

**Lab Worksheets**

 * [Week 5 worksheet](./labs/s25_lab5.Rmd) | [Week 6 worksheet](./labs/s25_lab6.Rmd) 

**Assignment**

 * Due May 15
 * [Assignment details](./assignments/assignment02_Sp25.html)
 
**Unit Quiz**: Due May 5 (Canvas)

## Unit 3: Analyzing Count Outcomes

**Topics**: 

- Methods to analyze count outcomes 

- Fitting and interpreting regression models for count outcomes with single-level data, nested data, and missing data

- Model fit assessment and diagnostics 

**Readings**: 
 
 * Complete prior to May 20 meeting: BMLR Ch. 4.1-4.4 (pp. 93-112) 
 * Complete prior to May 27 meeting: BMLR Ch. 4.5-4.10 (pp. 113-132), Ch. 5 (pp. 145-148)
